award_title: HCC: Small: NSF-DST: GameSignAI: Using AI to Help Deaf Children Acquire Language Skills
subject: Sign language datasets and open-source tools
body:
Hi Professor Starner,

Your work on helping deaf children learn sign language through mobile games is really impressiveâ€”especially the focus on building datasets and tools that can work across different sign languages.

I'm working on Ouro, which helps researchers share computational work like datasets, code, and notebooks in ways that are actually reproducible and discoverable. Given your emphasis on open-source and replication across languages, I think it could be useful for your team.

Happy to show you how it works.

Best,
